item.title: FFMpeg-List
item.description:
FFmpeg

  • 2015-An ffmpeg and SDL Tutorial: This tutorial is meant for people with a decent programming background. At the very least you should know C and have some idea about concepts like queues, mutexes, and so on. You should know some basics about multimedia; things like waveforms and such, but you don’t need to know a lot, as I explain a lot of those concepts in this tutorial.

  • 2022-FFmpeg: The Ultimate Guide: This guide covers the ins and outs of FFmpeg starting with fundamental concepts and moving to media transcoding and video and audio processing providing practical examples along the way.

OpenSource

  • 2019-ffmpeg.wasm : ffmpeg.wasm is a pure WebAssembly/JavaScript port of FFmpeg. It enables video & audio record, convert and stream right inside browsers.

  • Learn FFmpeg libav the Hard Way: I was looking for a tutorial/book that would teach me how to start to use FFmpeg as a library (a.k.a. libav) and then I found the “How to write a video player in less than 1k lines” tutorial. Unfortunately it was deprecated, so I decided to write this one.

  • 2015-How to Write a Video Player in Less Than 1000 Lines: There is a sample program that comes with ffmpeg called ffplay. It is a simple C program that implements a complete video player using ffmpeg.

item.title: Image-List
item.description:
服务端图片处理资料索引

  • delivering-octicons-with-svg:Github 决定用 SVG 取代 icon-fonts.

  • 2018-学会这些技巧，你就成了 GIF 达人

OpenSource

  • Photon : High-performance, cross-platform Rust/WebAssembly image processing library.

  • 2023-ThumbHash : A very compact representation of a placeholder for an image. Store it inline with your data and show it while the real image is loading for a smoother loading experience. It’s similar to BlurHash but with the following advantages:

item.title: QR-List
item.description:
QR: 二维码

  • QR 码基础

  • 二维码的生成细节和原理

OpenSource

  • qart.js:Generate artistic QR code.

  • IChing-JS : An IChing encoding and decoding library written in typescript for use in javascript-based web apps.

item.title: Svg-List
item.description:
Svg List

  • 2017-Svg 快速入门: SVG 全称是 Scalable Vector Graphics，即，矢量图。在 Web 中使用 SVG 可以解决位图放大失真的问题。首先，不要把 SVG 和 CSS，Canvas，HTML 搞混。他们之间并没有你中有我，我中有你的关系。SVG 是通过 XML 的形式写在 HTML 文档中的。

  • Hero Patterns A collection of repeatable SVG background patterns for you to use on your web projects.

Animation

  • Creating a Star to Heart Animation with SVG and Vanilla JavaScript

  • SVG 动画精髓：本文主要是讲解关于 SVG 的一些高级动画特效，比如 SVG 动画标签，图形渐变，路径动画，线条动画，SVG 裁剪等。

  • How SVG Line Animation Works

  • SVG Animation Tutorial

Chart

  • A simple pie chart in SVG

  • satori : Enlightened library to convert HTML and CSS to SVG

item.title: Video-List
item.description:
Video List | 音视频处理资料索引

  • digital_video_introduction: A gentle introduction to video technology, although it’s aimed at software developers / engineers, we want to make it easy for anyone to learn.

  • 优酷是如何防止视频被越权下载

  • 2018-视音频编解码技术零基础(理论总结): 视音频技术主要包含以下几点：封装技术，视频压缩编码技术以及音频压缩编码技术。如果考虑到网络传输的话，还包括流媒体协议技术。
